body:
We are in the business of helping people: we resolve customer questions, complaints and requests via e-mail. Are you proficient in German ? Are you skilled in using a computer? If so, we are glad to meet you!

We are looking for colleagues with good negotiation skills, persuasive and able to uncover customer needs. 

If you have the ability to communicate clearly and effectively , we invite you to apply for this job.

You will need to:

- Resolve customer questions, complaints and requests via E-mail
- Respond promptly to customer inquiries
- Handle and resolve customer complaints
- Perform customer verifications
- Record details of actions taken
title: Back Office Representative with German
